services.name: Classic Trim
services.discription: We give your firend a brush out and a simple trim. no add-ons

services.name: Wash and Go
services.discription: Full wash and blowdry. Simply haircut with a spray of puppy cologne

services.name: Introductory Trim
services.discription: This is more of a service for young puppies to get them aclimated to grooming

services.name: Hear my ROWR
services.discription: We give your firend a short cut aroung the body, keep it long roung the face. As to look like a lion.

services.name: Custom Dye-Job
services.discription: Your choice of colors and designs. May have to lighten fur on some dogs.
